feature: Relieves Lower Legs and Feet Tightness - improves circulation and reduce swelling by raising the legs. May help reduce the risk of DVT(deep vein thrombosis)helps to relieve back pain from sitting for long period of time.

Traveling with Kids - help children get better rest.The foot pillow fits perfectly in the gap between the seats and makes for a great bed, stool and leg rest which means you will never be your child’s cushion on the travel. It can allow kids to lie down, turn over or sleep on the side, make the children get better sleep.

Comfortable Journey - put your legs on the pillow with a great rest.The foot rest pillow supports your legs stretching or curling, and it can also elevate your feet and legs into many different directions.It will be a perfect companion for any of your flights.
